metadata.name: Breaking Bored
metadata.description:
Introducing Breaking Bored - the ultimate pixel-art adventure game inspired by the iconic TV show, Breaking Bad. Embark on a thrilling journey as you assume the role of a small-time chemist who gradually transforms into a notorious meth kingpin. Explore the city's seedy underbelly, build your drug empire, and outsmart your rivals to stay on top.

With its retro-inspired graphics and addictive gameplay, Breaking Bored is the perfect tribute to one of the greatest TV shows of all time. So what are you waiting for? Enter the dangerous world of Breaking Bored today and experience the thrill of becoming the ultimate drug lord!
